items.sentence: Tom didn't want anyone to know he had been dating Mary.
Tom didn't know Mary was interested in classical music.
I wonder whether or not Tom knew Mary couldn't do that.
I never knew Tom and Mary were having marital problems.
I know Tom can speak French. I wonder if Mary can, too.
Would you like to know how to prevent getting wrinkles?
The one and only dessert my son eats is chocolate cake.
The sooner you return, the happier your father will be.
Tom was sure he had enough money to buy what he needed.
Tom couldn't bring himself to watch what was happening.
Have you ever gone camping with any of your classmates?
I was in the neighborhood and thought that I'd drop by.
I really like talking to people in different languages.
All of a sudden, a fire broke out in the movie theater.
The meeting was a lot shorter than I expected it to be.
This pillow smells musty. Could you get me another one?
Tom's smiling face let everyone know that he was happy.
Let's get out of the house and take a walk in the snow.
I heard a thumping noise coming from the adjacent room.
I don't know why I was in such a bad mood this morning.
